text: I can play 6 instruments.
I have been to 14 countries.
I have lived in 3 countries.
I can juggle, beatbox, and do a standing backflip.
I have hitchhiker's thumb.
I am an Independence Day baby.
I build furniture as a hobby.
Kiwi is my favorite fruit.
My favorite animal is the bush baby.
My lucky number is 22.
At 16 I ran a fuel efficiency experiment on the effects of coasting and driving with the windows open.
I cook bacon like a boss.
I would want to be Green Lantern.
My favourite season is Spring.
Sometimes I spell favorite "favourite". I like to mix things up!
I like to read out loud.
Programming seems like a natural interest for someone whose last name is in CamelCase.
I am a podcast addict.
I sometimes speak in movie quotes.
My milkshakes DO bring boys to the yard!
I have competed in ballroom dancing!
